com.paypal.android.sdk.payments
Class PayPalService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalService

public class PayPalService
extends Service

Service responsible for communicating with PayPal's servers.

This service should be started shortly before you expect the user to make a purchase, and stopped when the user is finished shopping. Typically, this will happen in the onCreate() and onDestroy() of your activity.
